attributes.action: Change the rules on Mp's expenses so that they cannot profit from expense claims.  This is normal practice  in the Commercial Business Industry and so it should be for Members of Parliment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's should be recompensed for their expenses incurred while doing their parlimentary duties.  However they should not be able to profit from these expenses by employing 'friends and relatives' who have no real job function and neither should they profit from the sale of any house or premises which are claimed as part of their second home. In addition they should pay capital gains tax when they come to sell just as any other member of the public. Items such as Flat screen TV's, New Kitchens etc should not be allowed to be claimed as an expense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
